title: Jealousy
lyrics:
(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)
U make me jealous baby
Naega ileoneun geo
Igeol sasil-eun jeulgineun geoji
Na bolan deus-i deo

Eokkael dudeulyeo ha ha funny

Nalaseo teugbyeolhi geuleon jul al-assji

Honja chaggaghal ppeon haessne

Gominhadaga nae meoliman dingding

Daeche wae geuleoneun geonde



(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)

Uli amu sai aninde mwoji

(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)

Jakku geoseullyeo wae



A little, jealousy

Naega anin daleun salam ppanhi

Chyeodaboneun nunbich

Jealousy

Naega anin daleun salam yaegido

Geumanhaejwo Stop it



Jealousy baby jealousy

Jealousy baby jealousy



Baby who the X (ooh)

Iâ€™m a X (ooh)

Neo ttaem-e jigeum nan ppulnan dokkaebi (ooh)

Nan jeogtoma jiltu nanikka neol hyanghae

Keep going going going

I got it ilgob jung majimag chalye

Think these guys are better than me?

Ja malhae bwa

Nega neukkineun ge daeche mwonji

Geunyang nal midgo ttalawa fly with me



(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)

Jigeum wae tto syeonu yaegileul hani

(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)

Salam jiltu nage

Naega anin daleun salam ppanhi

Chyeodaboneun nunbich

Jealousy

Geumanhaejwo Stop it



Wow chaggagdo jegaggag

Nollineun ge mwoga geuli jaemissna

Wow sangsangdo jamkkanman

Ili alittaun geudaega issna

Nan jom jiltugana mam-e rat-a-tatta

Jeogi ttan neugdaedeul geuleuleongdaejima baby

Eodileul bwa yeogileul bwa

Hankkeobeon-e nae swagging swagging

Maelyeog eopil ooh



(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)

Daman ne jinsim-i geujeo gung-geumhae

(Ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-ye-yeh)

Ijen nado moleugess-eo

Ileodaga na eonjenga

Ama jiltue mag nun-i meolgessji

Ige ne jagjeon-ilamyeon

Aju jedaelo meoghyeoss-eo

Deo gakkai ije geuman uli
